column4: I find myself constantly pushing my cursor up to the top-left corner of my screen when I'm on Ubuntu Unity... LOL I always get a feeling as though I'm missing something, like tehre's windows I'm not aware of burried somewhere LOL. I'll never get used to looking at the launcher for little white arrows :\
GNOME 3 grew on me in less than 4 days it felt very comfortable and natural. KDE takes no learning curve at all..... It still has a start menu, 'nuff said :)
thanks, can we get back to the support issues instead of the rant
thanks, can we get back to the support issues instead of the rant?
